items.text: length outside off, defended firmly into the ground, in the direction of point
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, no run

items.text: this one bounces a bit extra, Liton waits for it before dabbing it towards third man
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: a touch fuller outside off, comes forward, lets the ball come on to the bat before guiding it towards point
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: down the leg side, misses the flick, given a wide
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 wide

items.text: back of length outside off, jumping at the batsman to hit near the splice, the bottom hand comes off
items.shortText: Paul to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: back of length outside off, opens to face of the bat to steer it towards third man
items.shortText: Thomas to Liton Das, 1 run

items.preText: Every single delivery by Thomas has been in excess of 140
items.text: back of length, on the stumps, defended back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Thomas to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: 142 kph, short of length, keeps a little low, Mushfiqur was looking to cut it away, plays over it
items.shortText: Thomas to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length, just outside off, defended towards cover-point
items.shortText: Thomas to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: back of length outside off, Mushfiqur rises on his toes and punches it past the cover
items.shortText: Thomas to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: back of length, on the body, worked away towards square leg
items.shortText: Thomas to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: Devendra Bishoo replaces Keemo Paul. A slip in place
items.text: length outside off, some turn and bounce, punches it towards point
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: a touch fuller, on off and middle, swept fine for a single
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: short and some room, goes back and cuts it away, four to deep backward point
items.shortText: Bishoo to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: flatter and quicker this time, pitching around off and spinning away to beat the batsman who was caught on the back foot
items.shortText: Bishoo to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length this time, just outside off, punched towards long-off
items.shortText: Bishoo to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: fuller on middle and leg, turned away towards square leg
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: a yorker, on middle and leg, Liton jams his bat at it
items.shortText: Thomas to Liton Das, no run

items.text: back of length outside off, goes back and drops it on the off side
items.shortText: Thomas to Liton Das, no run

items.text: a touch fuller outside off, gives himself some room and smashes it through covers for four
items.shortText: Thomas to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.preText: Firoz: "Does anyone else think that the real missing ingredient in the Bangladesh T20 side is a quality leg spin bowler?"
items.text: short of length but way down the leg side
items.shortText: Thomas to Liton Das, 1 wide

items.preText: Nazim Ali: "That's very impressive from Thomas... I hope to see him in the IPL "
items.text: fuller outside off, pushed back
items.shortText: Thomas to Liton Das, no run

items.text: serious pace here from Thomas, short of length outside off, Liton was looking to work it towards third man, misses
items.shortText: Thomas to Liton Das, no run

items.text: fuller outside off, comes forward and pushes it towards point
items.postText: TQ: "@Firoz, that's why Sunil joshi said after the zimbabwe series that they will be on the lookout for a mystery spinner/leg spinner in the upcoming edition of BPL"
items.shortText: Thomas to Liton Das, no run

items.preText: Shovik Faiyaz : "Has Thomas touched the 150kmph mark yet???" -- I think the maximum he reached is 148
items.text: length outside off, some sharp turn there, left alone
items.shortText: Bishoo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run
